about_the_game:
"Pumpkin Game" is a falling object puzzle game in which players try to pile up as many vegetables as possible so that they do not overflow from the basket.
When two or more vegetables collide with each other, they combine and evolve into a larger vegetable.
Since the space in the basket is limited, aim to make a pumpkin by systematically dropping vegetables and evolving them.

Game Features

  • All you have to do is "drop" the vegetables. It is very easy and quick to start, but so deep and addictive that you lose track of when to stop. Please try to play first. All you have to do is "drop" vegetables!
  • Three game modes:
    　Normal: Players can think carefully without being pressed for time.
    　Freeze: Playing in slippery baskets and vegetables is unpredictable and fun.
    　Time Limit: It tests your judgment to see how quickly you can increase your score as time is running out.
  • Cute illustrations of vegetables will soothe you.
  • Each vegetable has a different shape, weight, and size, so the key to a high score is to understand their characteristics and pile them up.
  • If you bump pumpkins against each other, you will get a ......

Video Submission and livestreaming Guidelines

Please observe the following guidelines when posting or livestreaming videos of games.
Only if you comply with the guidelines, you may post and live-stream videos without permission, regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation.

  • Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site or livestreaming site.
  • B.B.Alpha will not be held responsible for any damages incurred as a resulting from the posting or livestreaming of videos.
  • These guidelines are subject to change without notice.

name: Pumpkin Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3GHz以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
